abstracts.cdata!:
The Fourth Korea Development Finance
            Corporation Project will cover a portion of KDFC's
            expected foreign exchange requirements from mid-1973 until
            mid-1975. The terms of the loan will be similar to those of
            recent Bank loans to development finance companies. In view
            of the competence of KDFC's management and staff, its
            high operational standards, the soundness of its portfolio
            and its financial position and performance, and so as not to
            constrain its operations unnecessarily, the Bank Loan
            Agreement will provide for a debt/equity ratio of 4.5:1 in
            place of the present limit of 3:1. The free limit will be
            increased to $750,000 instead of the present $500,000, with
            an aggregate free limit of 25 percent of the loan amount.
